0.author: Mahatma Gandhi
0.body: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

1.author: Oscar Wilde
1.body: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

2.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
2.body: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

3.author: Mae West
3.body: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
